text: @WhiteHouse The look on Pence’s face during Cuomo’s clip says it all.  He was clearly embarrassed at your theatrics.  Do you think the American people are that stupid, can’t see through you? You’re an embarrassment Mr. President. What a ridiculous egotistical, narcissistic Covid19 briefing.
